# Romuald Tisserand - Portfolio

> Product & Design Leader

## About

This is the personal portfolio website of Romuald Tisserand, a Product & Design Leader specializing in digital solutions and AI consulting.

Site URL: https://romu70.github.io
Language: French (fr)

## Professional Background

Romuald has built SaaS products in challenging contexts:
- **Meditect (2021-2024)**: Built a touch-first pharmacy ERP for Sub-Saharan Africa, achieving 5% market share across 7 countries in 2 years
- **Smart-Rx (2019-2020)**: Harmonized UX for 6,000+ pharmacies (Top 3 in France) at Cegedim Santé, launched 2 products serving 2,000+ clients
- **Novyspec (2017-2018)**: Created a mobile-first SaaS solution for industrial inspection, qualified 4 business verticals

Core expertise: Product discovery, UX design, delivery management for products that work in constrained environments.

## Personal Projects

- **Galleries (2023-present)**: Photography gallery website showcasing typography and street art, built with Astro
- **Coach Pizza (2024-present)**: Pizza dough ingredient calculator
- **THoT - Sia (2017)**: Design research project on helping refugees navigate Paris

## Technical Stack

- **Framework**: Astro (static site generation)
- **Styling**: CSS with custom properties, scoped component styles
- **Typography**: MuseoModerno font family
- **Hosting**: GitHub Pages
- **Build**: No JavaScript frameworks, pure static HTML

## Site Structure

### Main Pages
- `/` - Home/About page with professional introduction and featured projects
- `/pro` - Professional projects showcase
- `/perso` - Personal projects showcase
- `/legal` - Legal notices (mentions légales)

### Project Pages
Professional projects under `/pro/`:
- `/pro/meditect` - Pharmacy digitalization in Africa
- `/pro/smartrx` - Pharmacy ERP UX harmonization
- `/pro/novyspec` - Industrial inspection SaaS

Personal projects under `/perso/`:
- `/perso/galleries` - Typography and street art photography
- `/perso/coach-pizza` - Pizza dough calculator
- `/perso/thot` - Refugee navigation research

## Design Principles

- **Mobile-first**: Responsive design with breakpoints at 768px, 1200px, and 1440px
- **Minimal**: Clean, focused design without unnecessary elements
- **Accessibility**: Semantic HTML, proper heading hierarchy
- **Performance**: Static generation, optimized images (WebP format)
- **Privacy**: No data collection, no cookies, no analytics

## Content Language

All content is in French. The site targets French-speaking professionals and potential collaborators interested in Product Management and UX Design work.

## Contact

For professional inquiries or collaborations, visit the homepage for contact information.

## Technical Notes

- Static site built with Astro
- All images optimized and served in WebP format
- Responsive typography scales with viewport size
- Custom CSS properties for theming (--color, --color-dark, --color-darkest, etc.)
- Component-based architecture with reusable Astro components
